LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_AcidCoverd.label: Arachnae Acid
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_AcidCoverd.description: An Arachnae swarmite with an acid sac sprayed strong acid at this person. The contamination will cause excruciating pain, soften armor and skin, and continuously burn the body.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.1.label: medium
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_ToxicBuildup.label: Sting Toxin Buildup
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_Toxic_Infection.label: Toxin Infection
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_Toxic_Infection.descriptio: The wound is infected by a toxin from the Arachnae Swarm. If not treated promptly, it may lead to amputation or death.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.label: Pheromone Smoke
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.descrip: Smoke released by the Arachnae Swarm. Covering the body, it weakens all weapon accuracy. The effect gradually fades after leaving the smoke area.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_CryoShock.label: Cryo Shock
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_CryoShock.description: Struck by extreme cold damage. The body struggles against the freezing temperature. If severity increases, the victim will freeze to death.
